TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XamlDeferringLoader extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XAML 讀取器行為，這個行為會載入並傳回延後的內容。

span.span: Represents a XAML reader behavior that loads and returns deferred content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別不是為基底類別由.NET Framework XAML 服務所實作的其他 XAML 讀取器。This class is not used as a base class by other XAML readers that are implemented by .NET Framework XAML Services. 相反地，它用於內部值傳遞讀取者這類; 或它用做基底類別是特定技術的實作，例如從 PresentationFramework.dll。Instead, it is used internally for value-passing by readers such as ; or it is used as a base class for a technology-specific implementation, such as from PresentationFramework.dll.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 呼叫 時傳回的啟始讀取器。

summary.span: 根據 和來自服務提供者的特定必要服務，以延後模式載入 XAML 內容。

span.span: Loads XAML content in a deferred mode, which is based on a and certain required services from a service provider.

returns.span: 由輸入 所產生的根物件。

span.span: The root object that is produced by the input .

span.span: The input value to commit for deferred loading.

Commits a value for deferred loading.

returns.span: XAML 讀取器，可用來取得延後的值做為 XAML 節點資訊。

span.span: A XAML reader that can be used to obtain the deferred value as XAML node information.
